channel.title: rozzi-media on Rozzi Media Group
channel.description: Recent content in rozzi-media on Rozzi Media Group

item.title: Contact Us
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: We are a little busy exploring space right now; we’ll get back to you when we return to this solar system.

item.title: About Us
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: Rozzi Media Group is See the project page: https://github.com/solutionroute/hugo-smorg, and the demo site: https://solutionroute.github.io/hugo-smorg/exampleSite/ for more information. Go Hugo!

item.title: OPRAmachine
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: OPRAmachine has radically simplified the process of requesting public records in all 565 municipalities in New Jersey. The web service has broken down barriers for individuals and organizations seeking to obtain authoritative information about New Jersey state & local government.

item.title: Syntax Highlighting
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: Code examples in different languagues to demonstrate syntax highlighting with the current hugo-smorg theme. Inline code looks like this->var and expand($flurb, $times).

item.title: 401 Unauthorized
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: A user name and password is required. You’ve attempted to visit a section of the website reserved for authorized users.

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.author: hello@rozzi.media (Rozzi Media Group)
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output.
